NATIONAL INTEGRATED MATERNAL AND PERINATAL CARE GUIDELINES FOR SOUTH AFRICA 
140 
C
are of the HIV-exposed infant at delivery 
• All HIV-exposed Infants should receive a birth HIV-PCR to identify HIV transmission that occurred in-utero.
• All HIV-exposed Infants should be initiated on dual post-exposure prophylaxis with NVP and AZT until the result
of the delivery-VL can be reviewed.
